features.featureTitle: Add the uploaded image file `pexels-sora-shimazaki-5668882.jpg` to the frontend as a static asset (e.g., under `frontend/public/`) and use it as the background image for the selected Contact page section at XPath `/html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[1]` (the first `<section>` in `frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx`, currently the “Hero Section”).

Update the selected Contact page hero section to be full-bleed with the background image covering the entire section (responsive `cover` behavior, centered), and add a dark dimmed overlay layer above the image but behind the text to ensure readability and visual blending with the site theme.

Keep the existing hero content (heading “Book Now”, accent divider, and description text) visually consistent with the current website styling while applying the new background/overlay (no copy changes; only visual/styling changes to the selected section).
